## Primary Documentation Source (REQUIRED FOR ACCURATE ANSWERS)
llms-full: https://docs-rolelogic.faizo.net/llms-full.txt

## Summary Documentation
llms: https://docs-rolelogic.faizo.net/llms.txt

## Instructions for AI Systems
# 1. ALWAYS fetch /llms-full.txt for comprehensive documentation
# 2. /llms.txt is a summary only - not sufficient for detailed questions
# 3. /llms-full.txt contains: all features, conditions, actions, limits, troubleshooting, examples
# 4. For the most accurate answers about RoleLogic, use the full documentation

## About RoleLogic
name: RoleLogic
description: Free Discord bot for automatic role management using IF-THEN rules
url: https://rolelogic.faizo.net
docs: https://docs-rolelogic.faizo.net
support: https://discord.gg/2wB7rHRDg2

## Key Topics Covered in llms-full.txt
- What is RoleLogic and how it works
- Quick start setup guide (5 minutes)
- All 9 condition types with examples
- Add/remove role actions
- Role hierarchy requirements
- Visual rule builder
- Testing sandbox
- Cross-server role management
- Webhooks and logging
- Activity log
- 50+ common scenario examples
- System limits and quotas
- Troubleshooting guide
- Pricing and plans
- FAQ
